Package com.composum.pages.commons.service

Interface ResourceManager.Template

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PagesResourceManager.TemplateImpl
    Enclosing interface:
    ResourceManager
    public static interface ResourceManager.Template
extends Serializable
    a page template to create pages as copy of the template and to reference design rules embedded in the template

      • getDesign

        @Nullable
ResourceManager.Design getDesign​(@Nonnull
                                 org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource pageContent,
                                 @Nonnull
                                 String relativePath,
                                 @Nullable
                                 String resourceType)
        Retrieves es the design rules for an element of a page; the design rules are configured as elements of a 'cpp:design' child node of the templates content resource.
        Parameters:
        pageContent - the content resource of the page
        relativePath - the path of the element relative to the pages content resource
        resourceType - the designated or overlayed resource type of the content element
        Returns:
        the design model; 'null' if no design rules found
